trans-unit.note: One of the Morse code prosign language, please make it concise and significant (e.g. capitalize, add dashes if appropriate). This one means: emergency! (the SOS signal)
One of the Morse code prosign language, please make it concise and significant (e.g. capitalize, add dashes if appropriate). This one means: attention!

Users can change language in settings app, this is one of the language name that will show in user's prefered language.
Users can change language in settings app, this is one of the language groups.
There are many prosign code in Morse, this is the name of one of them.
This button on the settings page brings up input configuration page.
A settings that allows user to choose if they want to use auto correction on audio decoder.
Name of a switch button (audio decoder automatically get wpm and pitch information).
One of the Morse code prosign language, please make it concise and significant (e.g. capitalize, add dashes if appropriate). This one means: I'm done, now back to you.

One of the Morse code prosign language, please make it concise and significant (e.g. capitalize, add dashes if appropriate). This one means: this station is closing.
One of the buttons on the Alert view.

trans-unit.id: Check this out! I converted text to this Morse code using Morse Transmitter! Download here:
trans-unit.source: Check this out! I converted text to this Morse code using Morse Transmitter! Download here:
trans-unit.target: 太腻害了有木有！我用这个App把文字翻译成摩尔斯电码了！你也下载玩玩！
trans-unit.note: When the user shares Morse code, this is the prefix string attached to it, followed by App Store URL.

Settings category: audio frequency.
This is a label on the output page, followed by the numer of audio frequency (pitch).
One of the titles on the Alert view.

trans-unit.id: Please restart this App after changing language.
trans-unit.source: Please restart this App after changing language.
trans-unit.target: 更换语言后，请在后台关闭应用，再重新开启，以使设置生效
trans-unit.note: This is a footer on the first section in language change settings, to reminder user restart the App after changing language.
A button on the settings page for user to rate on App Store.
A button on the settings page to reset some content.
A button on the settings page for user to restore their previous purchases.

One of the Morse code prosign language, please make it concise and significant (e.g. capitalize, add dashes if appropriate). This one means: shift from Morse code to Wabun code. (Wabun code is used by Japanese)
The title for settings page.
There are many sections on the settings page, this switch let the user choose if they want to copy the download link and promotional text when they copy Morse code.
There are many prosign code in Morse, this is the name of one of them.
This button on the settings page brings up output configuration page.
Users can change language in settings app, this is one of the language name that will show in user's prefered language.
This is a label on the output page, tells the user the range of supported WPM.

trans-unit.id: Swipe down or pinch to go back
trans-unit.source: Swipe down or pinch to go back
trans-unit.target: 返回：向下滑动或双指合拢
trans-unit.note: This is a label on the output page, tells user how to go back to home page.

trans-unit.target: 向两边滑动来删除此卡片
trans-unit.note: When user launches the app for the first time, there are tutorial cards on the home screen. This is one of the text that will be on the screen.
There are many sections on the settings page, this switch let the user toggle if the app should change to Night theme when the ambient censor detects the surrounding light is low.
Users can change language in settings app, this is one means the language is system default.
This is a label on the output page, tells user how to finish using audio input.

trans-unit.id: Tap anywhere to play or pause
trans-unit.source: Tap anywhere to play or pause
trans-unit.target: 点按任意地方来开始／停止输出
trans-unit.note: This is a label on the output page, tells user how to play or pause the output.

trans-unit.id: Tap me to output or share.

There are many sections on the settings page, this switch let the user change the color theme of this App.

trans-unit.id:
To make new language setting take effect, please restart application with following steps:

1. Double-tap Home button on your device.

2. Swipe up to terminate application in the background.

3. Start application from home screen.
trans-unit.source:
To make new language setting take effect, please restart application with following steps:
1. Double-tap Home button on your device.
2. Swipe up to terminate application in the background.
3. Start application from home screen.
trans-unit.target: 为了使语言设置生效，请您通过以下的步骤重新开启应用： 1. 双击主屏幕按键 2. 向上滑动来关闭应用程序 3. 在主屏幕重新开启应用
trans-unit.note: One of the titles on the Alert view.
There is a string on the input text view on home screen, promoting user to touch the text box to start typing.
There are categories on the settings page, this is one of the category.

trans-unit.id: When the ambient light is low with Switch Automatically turned on, the app will automatically switch to Night theme.
trans-unit.source: When the ambient light is low with Switch Automatically turned on, the app will automatically switch to Night theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果此选项处于打开状态，当周围光线减弱时，应用会自动切换到夜间模式，以保护视力
trans-unit.note: There are many sections on the settings page, this one explains what does Auto Switch button in Appearance section do.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct mis-spelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct mis-spelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果此选项处于打开状态，音频解码器会自动纠错拼写错误的英文单词。纠错的目标语言会随着您语言设置而更改
trans-unit.note: Explains what Auto Correct Mis Spelled Words does.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
trans-unit.target: 如果此选项处于打开状态，输出信号时屏幕会自动变亮，这样您就可以使用屏幕作为信号光源了
trans-unit.note: Explains what Output Brighten Screen does.

There is a string on the input text view on home screen, promoting user to touch the text box to start typing.
There are categories on the settings page, this is one of the category.
One of the Morse code prosign language, please make it concise and significant (e.g. capitalize, add dashes if appropriate). This one means: understood.
There are many prosign code in Morse, this is the name of one of them.
A button on the settings page for user make in-app purchase to unlock all the thems.
There are categories on the settings page, this is one of the category.
One of the Morse code prosign language, please make it concise and significant (e.g. capitalize, add dashes if appropriate). This one means: wait.
Settings category: word per minute.
This is a label on the output page, followed by the numer of WPM (word per minute).
There are many prosign code in Morse, this is the name of one of them.
When user launches the app for the first time, there are tutorial cards on the home screen. This is one of the text that will be on the screen.

trans-unit.id: When the ambient light is low with Switch Automatically turned on, the app will automatically switch to Night theme.
trans-unit.source: When the ambient light is low with Switch Automatically turned on, the app will automatically switch to Night theme.
trans-unit.note: There are many sections on the settings page, this one explains what does Auto Switch button in Appearance section do.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct mis-spelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct mis-spelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.
trans-unit.note: Explains what Auto Correct Mis Spelled Words does.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
trans-unit.note: Explains what Output Brighten Screen does.
